content: row of the chart uses one colour only - the slipped stitches are shown in the opposite colour to make it easier to visualize the pattern switch colours after every 2 rounds use cc for rounds 1-2 mc for rounds 3-4 etc when switching colours i drop the old yarn so that it hangs down and then bring the new yarn from the right over to the left trapping the old strand this forms a twist on the inside of the sock and minimizes the jog in the pattern the 8-stitch chart repeat is worked 7 8 9 10 times per round repeat the 16 row of the chart as many times as you like until the desired leg length for best results stop after row 2 or 10 but you can stop after finishing any 2 cc rounds heel flap turn so that ws is facing you and work heel flap over the next 27 31 35 39 sts using mc only note that this is 1 stitch fewer than half of the total number of stitches that extra stitch is now part of the instep for a total of 29 33 37 41 instep sts setup row ws p across turn capacitor socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 2 row 1 rs *k1 sl1 * repeat from * to * until 1 st remains k1 turn row 2 ws *k3 p1 * repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain k3 turn work row 1-2 a total of 17 19 21 23 times or until desired heel flap length and then work row 1 once more including the setup row the heel flap has 36 40 44 48 row heel turn the heel turn begins on a ws row only mc is used row 1 ws sl1 p15 17 19 21 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 p until 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 k until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3-4 until all stitches have been used 17 19 21 23 stitches remain do not turn after the final row gusset setup with mc pick up and knit 18 20 22 24 stitches along the side of the heel flap or 1 stitch for every 2 heel flap row place bor marker here at the beginning of the instep work in pattern according to the next row of the chart across the 29 33 37 41 instep sts pick up and knit the same number of stitches along the other side of the heel flap then knit to bor next round work instep sts according to the chart on the sole k1 ssk *k1 sl1 * repeat from * to * until 4 sts before bor k1 k2tog k1 foot switch to cc which should be waiting for you here at the bor round 1 cc work instep sts according to the chart knit across sole
